## VerseOptions interface

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface VerseOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [logLevel?](./verse-core.verseoptions.loglevel.md) |  | string | _(Optional)_ log level. Default is <code>info</code>. |
|  [maxAvatarFileSize?](./verse-core.verseoptions.maxavatarfilesize.md) |  | number | _(Optional)_ Maximum size of avatar file. Default is 1024 \* 1024 \* 32 (32MB). |
|  [maxNumberOfParallelFileTransfers?](./verse-core.verseoptions.maxnumberofparallelfiletransfers.md) |  | number | _(Optional)_ Maximum number of parallel file transfers. Default is 1 (send = 1 and receive = 1). |
|  [maxNumberOfPeople?](./verse-core.verseoptions.maxnumberofpeople.md) |  | number | _(Optional)_ Maximum number of people to display. Default is 10. |
|  [rtcConfiguration?](./verse-core.verseoptions.rtcconfiguration.md) |  | RTCConfiguration | _(Optional)_ The <code>rtc_configuration</code> parameter is a parameter of the constructor of [RTCPeerConnection](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/RTCPeerConnection/RTCPeerConnection)<!-- -->. It is mainly used to configure <code>iceServers</code> and <code>certificates</code>. |
